H0.text: What atoll gained notoriety after the United States tested nuclear weapons there. Bikini

H1.text: What atoll gained notoriety after the United States tested nuclear weapons there. Enewetak

H2.text: What atoll gained notoriety after the United States tested nuclear weapons there. Kwajalein

H3.text: What atoll gained notoriety after the United States tested nuclear weapons there. Pikinni

A4.text: After the Second World War, the atoll was chosen by the United States as a nuclear weapon testing site.

A5.text: The nuclear weapons testing at Bikini Atoll program was a series of 23 nuclear devices detonated by the United States between 1946 and 1958 at seven test sites.
